extendedInfo.description: MyGPA - GPA Calculator is a powerful, easy to use grade tracking tool. It will help track your school progress giving you an accurate calculation of your current grade. In addition, it will also calculate the best and worst case scenario based on your remaining assignments.It is excellent for usage throughout a student's academic career to monitor their current progress. With the best and worst case grade calculation engine, students can see what is the maximum and minimum grade they can achieve. With this information at hand, students can determine how to manage their time better to maximize their GPA.Features:- Track your academic progress from academic career, academic year, term, course, grade group, and marks- Calculates your best case and worst case grades  (percentage, GPA, letter grade)- Fully customizable grade schemes to map percentage ranges to leter grades and GPA- Pre-configured with common grade schemes from several Universities plus other generic schemes- Intuitive easy to use user interface- Fully integrated to android menu and context menu for easy to use navigation- Central dashboard to quickly access features of the application - Quick, accurate calculation engineMyGPA Lite version is limited to the following:- 1 academic year- 1 term - 3 coursesMyGPA Full Version is available at:https://market.android.com/details?id=com.dtam.mygpaKeywords: gpa calculator school score academic percentage grade point average course term semester calculation transcript exam letter grade university college mark A+ success student test percent

reviews.title: Ripoff!
reviews.comment: This app is just a straight ripoff of GradeWizard with minimal changes. Do not support this app!
reviews.author: Clarence Simpson
